elements.name: panel4
question10
elements.html:
•  Direct Guidance - Unable to perform the procedure without the supervising surgeon.
  •  Monitoring and supervision - Proactive supervision, supervising surgeon constantly monitoring to intervene when required.
  •  Minimal or no supervision - Reactive supervision, supervising surgeon available at critical times as needed.
  •  Safe and competent - No direct supervision. Supervising surgeon confident trainee will ask for guidance if required.
  • Supervise others - Trainee can supervise others completing this procedure.

elements.description:
Assessor observes the trainee performing the procedure. 
Overall, which describes the level of competence of the trainee for this type of case?

elements.name: panel3
question4
elements.title: Planning and preparation
elements.description: Communicates plan for procedure, ensures equipment is available, personally checks patient’s record and investigations, demonstrates good asepsis, observes timeout, safe patient positioning, checks appropriate drug administration

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Operative technique
elements.description: Adequate exposure, demonstrates manual dexterity to complete procedure, uses instruments safely, respects tissue, follows logical sequences of procedural steps, economy of movement

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Situational awareness
elements.description: Anticipates and responds to variations well, could deal with unexpected events

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Communication
elements.description: Clear communication with other members of surgical team, utilises assistance effectively, adapts language to suit, thorough written documentation

elements.name: question7
elements.title: Postoperative management
elements.description: Wound closure, clear postoperative instructions, deals with specimens appropriately.

elements.title: Specific feedback
elements.description: Consultant comments on what was done well and providessuggestions on how the trainee may improve. Not all boxes need to be completed.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Trainee would benefit from observation and feedback on a similar case.
